workExperience.description: Led the development of a high-performance payment processing platform handling millions of transactions daily. Implemented microservices architecture with 99.99% uptime and sub-100ms response times.
responsibilities: Architected the microservices-based payment processing system
Implemented high-performance database design with sharding
Designed and implemented security and compliance features
Led the development team and mentored junior engineers
Established monitoring, logging, and alerting infrastructure

achievements.title: Scaled to 5M+ Daily Transactions
achievements.description: Successfully scaled the payment platform to handle over 5 million daily transactions
achievements.impact: 40% reduction in infrastructure costs while maintaining 99.99% uptime

achievements.title: PCI DSS Compliance
achievements.description: Achieved and maintained PCI DSS Level 1 compliance for payment processing
achievements.impact: Enabled secure processing of credit card transactions

workExperience.description: Developed scalable backend systems for multiple ecommerce platforms. Implemented RESTful APIs, database optimization, and cloud infrastructure solutions.
responsibilities: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for ecommerce platforms
Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies
Developed inventory management and order processing systems
Collaborated with frontend teams for API integration

achievements.title: API Performance Optimization
achievements.description: Improved API response times by 60% through database optimization and caching
achievements.impact: Enhanced user experience and reduced server load

workExperience.description: Provided consulting services to multiple startups, helping them build scalable backend systems and optimize their technical infrastructure.
responsibilities: Architected backend systems for early-stage startups
Implemented database design and optimization strategies
Set up CI/CD pipelines and deployment infrastructure
Provided technical guidance and code reviews
Mentored development teams on best practices

education.description: Completed a comprehensive computer science program with focus on software engineering, algorithms, and system design.
achievements: Technical Lead for College Coding Club

education.description: Achieved AWS Solutions Architect Associate certification demonstrating expertise in cloud architecture and AWS services.

certifications.name: AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate
certifications.description: Demonstrates expertise in designing distributed systems on AWS

certifications.name: Node.js Application Developer
certifications.description: Certified Node.js developer with expertise in server-side JavaScript

experience.summary: Over 8 years of experience in backend engineering with a focus on fintech and ecommerce applications. Proven track record of building scalable systems that handle millions of transactions daily. Expert in Node.js, Python, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, Kubernetes, and AWS. Passionate about clean code, system design, and mentoring junior developers.
experience.metaDescription: 8+ years of experience in backend engineering, fintech solutions, and scalable architecture.

metaDescription: 8+ years of experience in backend engineering, fintech solutions, and scalable architecture.
